ja501:20.1: Kathaṃ tvaṃ pamokkho → kathaṃ pamokkho (bj, pts1) | kathaṃ te pamokkho (?)
ja501:26.3: Abajjhi taṃ → abajjhi tañca (bj, pts1) | abajjhi ta (s3)
ja501:31.4: umāpupphasarinnibhaṃ → ummāpupphasirinibhaṃ (bj) | ummāpupphasirinnibhaṃ (s2, s3, pts1, mr)
ja501:33.1: Kasivāṇijjā → kasī vaṇijjā (bj, pts1) | kasivaṇijjā (s2, s3)
